name: Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 2: Contemplation
description:
Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 2: Contemplation is an action game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Capcom. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 2: Contemplation is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
